on reading compounds: 関与【カンヨ】participation, taking part in, participating in, being concerned in
干渉【カンショウ】interference, intervention, meddling
欄干【ランカン】railing, guard rail, handrail, banister, balustrade, parapet, (shining) brightly (of the moon or stars), (flowing) endlessly (of tears)
水干【スイカン】everyday garment worn by nobles in ancient Japan, silk dried after having been washed in plain water and stretched out
kun reading compounds: 干す【ほす】to air, to dry, to desiccate, to drain (off), to drink up, to deprive of a role, job, etc.
